name: Speakeasy Scramble
description:
The year is 1929.  You run a humble speakeasy.  

Can you keep the customers happy, even as a drunk rummages the place?

Gamepad Controls

Left stick - move

A button - pick up / put down 

X button - pour from bottle

Keyboard Controls

WASD / arrow keys - move

Shift - pick up / put down

Ctrl - pour from bottle

Credits

Composer - Michael Macapagal

3D Models and Animations - Rubikow

2D Art - 🐉FossilGarden🐉

Programming and Design - Matt Kimball
